source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_00<tab>Tataru regards you with a grim countenance. Whatever could the matter be?
target: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_00<tab>砂の家のタタルは、あるものを探してきてほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_01 This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_01本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、レヴナンツトールの「スラフボーン」から再受注してください。

※次のメインクエストは、「メインクエストガイド」からも確認することができます。メインクエストガイドの表示/非表示は、メインコマンドの「キャラクターコンフィグ」から「ユーザーインターフェース設定」を選び、変更してください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_02<tab>Medguistl states that her stores of highland tea leaves were depleted but a few bells prior to your arrival. She advises you to seek out Emanuel the wine seller, who plies his wares in the courtyard of Camp Dragonhead.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_02<tab>メドグイスティルは、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88B901 /var>を切らしてしまっているようだ。キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドの酒商人「エマニュエル」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_03<tab>Recognizing you from your previous escapades in Coerthas, Emanuel regretfully explains that his next shipment of highland tea leaves is unlikely to arrive for some time. This being the case, he proposes that you harvest the leaves yourself from the plants which grow along the riverbanks in Boulder Downs─adding that you may need to mind your surroundings whilst doing so.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_03<tab>エマニュエルによれば、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88B901 /var>の採取地に魔物が出没していることが原因で、茶葉を入荷できないでいるらしい。キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッド南西の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8FA601 /var>を調べ、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88B901 /var>を手に入れよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_04<tab>Braving all manner of unfriendly wildlife, you succeed in harvesting a sufficiency of highland tea leaves. Deliver your fragrant haul to Tataru, who is waiting outside the Waking Sands, and be done with this second errand.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88B901 /var>を無事、手に入れることができた。砂の家にいる「タタル」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88B901 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_05<tab>Tataru wastes no time preparing her tonic, and you listen with mounting disgust as she recites its ingredients in song. For a mercy, you are spared the full horror of the recipe when she abruptly remembers that a crisis has erupted in your absence.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_SEQ_05<tab>タタルに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88B901 /var>を無事、渡すことができた。彼女によれば、なにやら緊急事態が発生したらしいが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TODO_00本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
レヴナンツトールのスラフボーンから再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TODO_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TODO_01本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
レヴナンツトールのスラフボーンから再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TODO_02<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TODO_02本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
レヴナンツトールのスラフボーンから再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TODO_03<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TODO_03本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
レヴナンツトールのスラフボーンから再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_000<tab>Preparing for the move is taking a terrible toll on everyone's mental and physical well-being. People have been carrying on for days at a time with barely any food or drink, never mind rest. Some have been too busy to visit the <var 1A 02 /var>privy<var 1A 01 /var>, for gods' sakes!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_000本部移転が決まってからというもの、
引っ越しや新本部設営で、みなさんキリキリ舞い。
なのに、作業は今が山場で、休む暇もないのでっす！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_001<tab>I try to lift their spirits, but encouraging words simply aren't enough anymore.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_001……受付を担当している私のお仕事は、
みなさんを元気づけ、笑顔にすることでっす。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_002<tab>Given that nothing short of hitting them over the head with something heavy will persuade them to rest, my only remaining option is to try improving their diet. I know just how to do it, too: with a special tonic proven to revive flagging spirits.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_002そこで、みなさんに栄養たっぷりの薬茶を配って、
元気でニコニコになってもらおうと思ったのでっすが……

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_003<tab>But for that, I require highland tea leaves─and the one merchant I know who sells them is completely out of stock. Harvesting them myself isn't an option, either, as the plant only grows in Coerthas, and I'm in no position to leave the Waking Sands at present.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_003なんと、材料の茶葉……
「」が売り切れていたのでっす！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_004<tab>But <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─and since you now understand how important this is, you'll <var 1A 02 /var>surely<var 1A 01 /var> agree to assist me? Great! I'll take that silence as a yes.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_004「」は、
クルザス地方に生えてるって聞いたことがありまっす。
この茶葉を探してきてくれまっせんか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_005<tab>I learned the recipe from an Ishgardian acquaintance of mine who serves at Camp Dragonhead. Medguistl's her name. She'll know where to obtain highland tea leaves, I'm sure of it. Godsspeed!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_005クルザス地方に住んでる方なら、
詳しい人もいると思いまっす。
どうか、よろしくお願いしまっす！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_006<tab>Highland tea leaves don't seem to be a very popular commodity outside of Coerthas, so I doubt you'll find them for sale in these parts. Nevertheless, they are an essential ingredient of this tonic.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_006「」は、
クルザス地方に生えてるって聞いたことがありまっす。
この茶葉を探してきてくれまっせんか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_007<tab>It was my friend Medguistl who gave me the recipe, so she must surely know where the tea leaves can be obtained. Please, hurry to Camp Dragonhead and ask her. You know how important this is!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_007クルザス地方に住んでる方なら、
詳しい人もいると思いまっす。
どうか、よろしくお願いしまっす！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_MEDGUISTL_000_010<tab>Now <var 1A 02 /var>there's<var 1A 01 /var> a face I shan't soon forget, not after all the chaos you left in your wake. 'Twas for the best, of course, but still...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_MEDGUISTL_000_010あら……おかえりなさい、冒険者さん。
ふふ、あなたのことはちゃ～んと覚えてるわよ。
だって、オルシュファン様を助けてくださった方だもの。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_MEDGUISTL_000_011<tab>Tataru sent you in search of <var 1A 02 /var>highland tea leaves<var 1A 01 /var>? Ah. Had you come but a few bells sooner, I'd have given you my remaining supply. Alas, you did not, and now I have none.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_MEDGUISTL_000_011……「」が欲しいの？
ううん、ちょうど切らしてしまっているのよ。
ごめんなさいね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_MEDGUISTL_000_012<tab>Where did I acquire my stock? Emanuel, where else? He sells more than wines and spirits, after all.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_MEDGUISTL_000_012そうねぇ……
あの茶葉で淹れた紅茶は、お酒で割ることもあるわ。
酒商人の「エマニュエル」に相談してはどうかしら？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_020<tab>As ever, it is a pleasure to serve such an esteemed personage as yourself. Alas, I cannot furnish you with that which I do not have.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_020「」ですか。
なんとも間の悪い……いや、申し訳ありません。
あいにく、在庫を切らしておりまして。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_021<tab>I know not when my next shipment will arrive, but I fear it will not be soon. Assuming you cannot afford to wait, might I humbly suggest that you consider harvesting the leaves yourself? If you travel to Boulder Downs and scour the riverbanks, you should have no trouble finding the plants.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_021「」の採取地は、
ここから南西の川辺にあるんですがね。
最近、そこに魔物が出没するようになったんです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_022<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> challenge will be keeping the local fauna at bay while you set about picking the tea.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_022茶葉を採取していると、その魔物に襲われるってんで、
園芸師が敬遠してしまいまして。
こうなりますと、まあ、うちの在庫もつきますわな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_023<tab>But what are mere beasts to the brave adventurer who fought at Lord Haurchefant's side!?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_023オルシュファン様たちを助けてくださった方の頼みだ、
聞いてあげたいのは山々ですが、相手が魔物では……。
どうか、堪忍してくださいよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_024<tab>As I believe I mentioned, I cannot say with any certainty when my next shipment of highland tea leaves will arrive. Rather than resign yourself to what may prove to be a lengthy wait, you might consider visiting Boulder Downs and harvesting the leaves yourself.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_EMANUEL_000_024「」の採取地は、
ここから南西の川辺にあるんです。
魔物が出るので気を付けてください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_030<tab>I'm at my wit's end, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This tonic is the Scions' only hope! Without it, I don't know <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> will become of us! Please─you have to find those leaves!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_030栄養たっぷりの薬茶を配れば、
みなさん、きっと元気でニコニコになりまっす。
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんだけが、頼りなのでっす！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_040<tab>You brought them! You really brought them! Thank you so much!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_040これでっす！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ありがとうございまっす！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_041<tab>There's no time to waste─I shall begin brewing without delay!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_041さっそく、特製薬茶を作ってみるでっす！
私の手作りでっす！　気合入れて作るでっす！

source:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_042A dollop of honey, a fresh sprig of mint,♪
Aloe extract, just so...♪
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_042フンフ　フンフ　フーン。
ひーとくち　のーめば　げーんきに　なーるのー。
ぜーんぶ　まーぜて　すーりつぶすー。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_043A tincture of tea, but no more than a hint,♪
To buoy my beloved beau...♪
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_043あーろえ　はーちみつ　がーらごみーんとー。
げーんきの　みーなもと　かーくしあじー。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_044Nix eyes and flan flesh ground to a paste,♪
Fresh ogre offal for─
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_044とーどのおめめー　ぷりーんのちーにくー。
おーがのはーらわたーを　ぶーちこむのー。
フッフ　フンフ　フーン。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_045<tab><gasp> ...The NEWS! Uwaaah! I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> there was something I'd forgotten to mention!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_045……おおぅ！
薬茶に夢中で、大事なことを忘れていたのでっす！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_046<tab>Ill tidings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! As ill as ill can be! Another crisis in the making!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE113_01187_TATARU_000_046)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが留守の間に、
なにやら緊急事態みたいでっす！！
